lead_paragraph: The decision added support for a narrative that revolves around perceived slights and anti-Russian conspiracies taking place in the outside world.

byline.contributor: Patrick Reevell and Ivan Nechepurenko contributed reporting from Moscow.

headline.print_headline: Culture of Grievances Finds Another in Track Ban at Olympics
headline.main: Olympic Ban Adds to Russia’s Culture of Grievances

snippet: The decision added support for a narrative that revolves around perceived slights and anti-Russian conspiracies taking place in the outside world.
abstract: Russian ban from 2016 Olympics contributes to country's view that others stand against them and country is being victimized.
